gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 112, Raptors 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeat the Raptors, 112-103. Caleb Martin led the Heat with 24 points, 12 rebounds, and three assists as Duncan Robinson (21 points, 6 rebounds, 7 assists) and Jimmy Butler (19 points, eight assists) totaled 40 points. Pascal Siakam led Toronto with 30 points, four rebounds, and 6 assists while OG Anunoby added 23 points, eight rebounds, and six assists.
